title: ISaveBodyFeatureData.RemoveSaveBodies
description: Removes the specified bodies from this Save Bodies feature.

parameters.name: Bodies
parameters.description: Array of bodies to remove from this Save Bodies feature

returns: True if the bodies are removed from this Save Bodies feature, false if not
remarks:
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
